openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: Email Templates description: Manage Handlebars-based email templates globally and create channel-specific overrides. servers: - url: 'https://api.bigcommerce.com' description: BigCommerce API Gateway paths: '/stores/{store_hash}/v3/marketing/email-templates': get: summary: Get Email Templates description: |- Get a list of email templates. > #### Note >`/marketing/email-templates` endpoints only work after opting into the new email management experience from your store's control panel. You can opt-in by visiting Email Templates. If you have already opted in, visiting the Email Templates page will return a `404` error, and you will be able to access the new Transactional Emails page. responses: '200': content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: data: $ref: '#/components/schemas/EmailTemplatesCollection' meta: type: object examples: Example: value: data: - type_id: account_reset_password_email body: ' Title
